file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 32-50-07-02 - FEEDBACK UNIT (POTENTIOMETER) - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL FEEDBACK UNIT (POTENTIOMETER) - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedure to restore the feedback potentiometer. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY FEEDBACK POTENTIOMETER - RESTO- ALL 32-50-07-900-801-A RATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 32-50-07 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 32-50-07-900-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. FEEDBACK POTENTIOMETER - RESTORATION A. General (1) Refer to the LIEBHERR Component Maintenance Manual (CMM) 32-21-10 to restore the feedback potentiometer. (2) Restore the feedback potentiometer together with the restoration of the NLG leg. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION HYDRAULIC SYSTEM - PRESSURIZATION WITH AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200 EMDP SAFETY PIN OF THE NLG DOORS SOLENOID AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200 VALVE - INSTALLATION AND REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - REMOVAL AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400 NOSE LANDING-GEAR LEG - INSTALLATION S.B.145-32-0036 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) For aircraft PRE-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, make sure that the pressure in hydraulic system No. 1 is fully released ( AMM TASK 29-10-00-860-802-A/200). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, install safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). (3) The feedback potentiometer is removed together the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-000-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-50-07 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Restore Feedback Potentiometer (Figure 201) SUBTASK 900-002-A (1) Refer to the last revision of the LIEBHERR CMM 32-21-10 to restore the feedback potentiometer. K. Follow-on (Figure 201) SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) The feedback potentiometer is installed together with the NLG leg ( AMM TASK 32-20-01-400-801-A/400). (2) For aircraft POST-MOD. S.B.145-32-0036, remove safety pin of the NLG doors solenoid valve (AMM TASK 32-00-02-910-801-A/200). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 900-801-A/200 32-50-07 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
